title: Episode 257: Taste the Rainbow (Feat. LisaRaye McCoy)
itunes:title: Episode 257: Taste the Rainbow (Feat. LisaRaye McCoy)
description:
Actress, model, and media personality LisaRaye opens up about her previous marriages and the advice she shares with her sister, Da Brat. LisaRaye responds to Nicki Minaj name dropping her in “Trollz,” turning down Housewives, and much more. Enjoy!

UMC is the first and largest streaming service dedicated to Black TV and Film. Make sure to visit UMC.TV and use code LIPSERVICE for your free 30-day trial.

 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
